item.title: Creating this Website
item.description: I’ll be honest: I’ve always been impressed by people who just quickly throw together a website for a thing. Although I’ve been a professional software developer for about seven years now, I’ve never done so. Recently, I acquired this domain to use with mails, had some time on my hand and decided I’d finally give it a go.
